intent_data.goal: INVESTIGATE why updates haven't been deployed to production (https://appliance-cover-form.vercel.app), fix missing assets (favicon.ico), and integrate CSV export functionality into processor portal. Ensure no feature duplication.

requirements.description: INVESTIGATE why updates haven't been deployed - check deployment status, Vercel configuration, git commits
Fix favicon.ico 404 error - ensure favicon is properly deployed
Integrate CSV export functionality into processor portal (it already has an export button)
Ensure no duplicate features - finish or improve existing features only
Verify all assets are properly deployed
Test export functionality in processor portal
Ensure processor portal export button works correctly

routing_decision.reason: Score 41/100 falls in 41-70 range for FULL Discovery. Appropriate for medium complexity project requiring deployment investigation, asset fixes, and export integration.

pattern_influence.adjustment_reason: No patterns available (new stream, empty pattern store). Current routing confirmed as appropriate.

foundation_components.baseline_intent: INVESTIGATE why updates haven't been deployed to production (https://appliance-cover-form.vercel.app), fix missing assets (favicon.ico), and integrate CSV export functionality into processor portal. Ensure no feature duplication.

deployment_investigation.issue: Changes made locally but not deployed to Vercel. No git repository means changes aren't tracked. Manual deployment required.
deployment_investigation.solution: Deploy latest changes using 'vercel --prod' and 'firebase deploy --only database'

discovery_summary: FULL Discovery complete. Deployment resolved. Key findings: Processor portal has comprehensive export (use it, remove duplicate), favicon needs ICO fallback, export-sales-appliances.html is orphaned and should be removed. 12 requirements identified (1 complete, 11 pending). 3 patterns identified. Structure analyzed. Ready for Planning.

favicon_fix.pattern: Add ICO fallback for SVG favicons

export_integration.pattern: Use existing processor portal export, remove duplicates

asset_deployment.pattern: Ensure assets in src/ are deployed
